survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from homeowners regarding their experiences and opinions on smart water meters, including installation, usage, and perceived benefits.

questions.question_text: Do you currently have a smart water meter installed in your home?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question to segment respondents. Consider adding a 'Not sure' option for clarity.
